VMWare consumer products come with unreasonable 12 hour email-only response, even for first time initial install errors (http://www.vmware.com/support/services/)! This causes many to consider VMWare Workstation and Fusion inferior products. Additionally consumers are cautioned that since support is only open for less than 12 hours, frequently support calls mean that they will wait 2 days for support - even if its a production machine!!!
  â   â
VMWare breaks with industry standards by not providing fast response to initial install errors for paid products! Consumers might be tempted to say "VMWare Sucks!" based on this abnormal industry initial install support. Consider avoiding this product.
